Что у нас под капотом?: What do we have under the hood?
Feature Sliced Design — современный подх: Feature Sliced Design — A modern approach to structuring code. Like a puzzle that always matches the picture on the box.
Webpack и Vite — эти инструменты помогаю: Webpack and Vite — these tools help us assemble a project quickly and efficiently.
TypeScript и SCSS — эти инструменты помо: TypeScript and SCSS — these tools help us write clean and typed code.
i18next — благодаря этой библиотеки вы м: i18next — thanks to this library you can change the language in an instant.
Jest, Cypress и React Testing Library —: Jest, Cypress и React Testing Library — indispensable helpers that help us make sure everything works like clockwork. Storybook and Loki allow us to visualize and test our components by creating stories for each of them.
ESLint, Prettier и Stylelint — наши стра: ESLint, Prettier and Stylelint — our guardians of code purity. They don't miss errors and make sure our code is readable and consistent.
TS-Morph, Dependency-Cruiser и Circular-: TS-Morph, Dependency-Cruiser and Circular-Dependency-Plugin — help us analyze and improve code structure.
JSON Server позволяет нам создавать быст: JSON Server allows us to create quick mocs for RESTful APIs.
Husky и lint-staged гарантируют, что каж: Husky and lint-staged ensure that every commit meets our standards.
Concurrently оптимизирует наши рабочие п: Concurrently optimizes our workflows by allowing us to run multiple tasks simultaneously.
browserslist помогает нам оставаться сов: browserslist helps us stay compatible with many browser versions.
Наши автоматизированные процессы обеспеч: Our automated processes ensure fast and painless integration and delivery. And nginx configuration guarantees stability and security of our server.
